# Package & Guide Overview {-}

The `autovalid` package was developed by Gordon Arsenoff and MaryClare Roche to 
aid Arab Barometer in assessing survey data quality.

This guide should serve as a reference for how to use the `autovalid` package and
how to understand the results.
